name: fundwarden
description: About The complete Codebase for Fundwarden - A Budget Allocator and Expense Tracking Application for your Personal Finance. Made for CS50x Final Project.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npx @tailwindcss/cli -i app/static/src/features_src.css -o app/static/dist/features.css --content app/templates/**/*.html --watch" "npx @tailwindcss/cli -i app/static/src/input.css -o app/static/dist/main.css --content app/templates/**/*.html --watch"
